quest.name: Moglin's Judgment
journal: Chieftain Moglin is ready to pass judgment on your trial performance.

After witnessing your conduct during your grueling “trials,” Chieftain Moglin declares that he has an announcement to make. Gather your companions that you might all be present to hear the moogle leader's decision.

You speak to each of your companions in turn, and inform them of Chieftain Moglin's impending announcement. Return to the center of Moghome, and notify the moogle leader that everyone is ready to hear him pass judgment.

Chieftain Moglin somewhat sheepishly admits that your trials were nothing more than a convenient distraction─a means to keep you and your companions occupied while the moogles repaired the horn required to summon Hraesvelgr. It would seem the mere presence of Kuplo Kopp was enough to dispel any doubts the chieftain may have had regarding your intentions. Trouble Moghan for his thoughts on these questionable proceedings.

Moghan guiltily thanks you for your hard work, but deflects all the blame for the deception onto Chieftain Moglin. Though some of your companions are less than impressed with their treatment at the hands of the moogles, you now have a destination to aim for─Zenith.

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text: Forename─if that is what you insist on calling yourself─you have completed the Trials of Trustworthiness administered by the taskmasters Moghan, Mogmug, and Mogwin!

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text: During these grueling tests of character, I closely observed your conduct─as well as that of your companions...

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text: And...I am decided, kupo! Gather your friends before me now, so that I need not repeat myself...needlessly.

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text: Not another word until you have summoned your companions, kupo! I was quite serious about the “not repeating myself” part...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: KUPLOKOPP
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Are these “trials” over, then? My tasks have been little more than household chores...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: If our hosts elect not to grant their aid after working us like pack chocobos, I shall demand compensation in kupo nuts out of principle. But I hope it will not come to that. Let us hear the chieftain's verdict, shall we?

dialogue.name: BODYGUARD01623
dialogue.text: They had the Elder Seedseer scrubbing and sweeping... The Elder Seedseer!

dialogue.name: BODYGUARD01412
dialogue.text: I never imagined my duties would include tidying up fallen leaves in a moogle village beyond the clouds...

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: What sorcery is this...? That my heart should stir at mere...fluffiness...

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: Forename! I-I was... No matter. What is it? ...Chieftain Moglin has made his decision? Well, let us not keep him waiting, then!

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: Standing here in Moghome, my thoughts turn inevitably to the legend of Good King Moggle Mog XII, and his seat in the heavens...

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: Like most, I thought it no more than a myth─a story for younglings that grew with the telling. But with every passing moment, I become more certain that we have discovered the origin of the tale. Full eager am I to hear what the chieftain has to say.

dialogue.name: KUPLOKOPP
dialogue.text: We've become such friends, kupo! My moogle cousins love to sing and dance as much as I do!

dialogue.name: KUPLOKOPP
dialogue.text: ...Chieftain Moglin has finally come to a decision, has he? Well, I suppose I'd better flutter over and see him, then!

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: How go your trials, Warrior of Light? I myself have been sent on a number of expeditions to “chastise” the local dragon population. Did not their chieftain wish to avoid inflaming the Dravanians...?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Such contradictions aside, our hosts seemed entranced by the height of my leap. They compared me to “Mog,” a lance-wielding moogle warrior of eld who also favored such attacks.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: 'Twas meant as a compliment, I expect, but I doubt these furry lumps could outleap a karakul lamb, much less a dragoon. Conclude your business here swiftly, Forename─I like not this place.

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text: Never have I seen such determined workers, kupo! It would have taken us moons to complete all those dreary chores and niggling errands!

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: And have our labors proven the purity of our intentions, Chieftain?

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text: Without a doubt! In fact, there was never really all that much doubt to begin with... You were, after all, already friends with a fellow moogle.

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text: But, you see, before any meeting with Hraesvelgr could take place, certain preparations needed to be made... And what better way to help you pass the time than by having you perform all the tiresome tasks that no one ever wants to do, kupo!

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Grrr...

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text: Ohhh dear... Th-The horn! Bring out the horn! Quickly now!

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text: We blow on this wondrous instrument whenever we wish to speak with the great wyrm, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text: We, uh...we haven't perhaps been treating it with the care it deserves of late (and I think Moghan may have sat on it), so we needed some time for cleaning and polishing (and straightening).

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text: No lasting harm done, though! Now, you need simply head to Zenith─the wyrm's dwelling to the west─and give the horn a good toot.

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: We are in your debt, Chieftain. Thanks to your noble gift, we shall finally have a chance to plead our case to Hraesvelgr.

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text:
...Very possibly, yes.
...But I wouldn't get my hopes up too high, kupo. The old wyrm isn't terribly fond of...um...

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: Your concern is appreciated, but I am quite certain that Hraesvelgr will welcome our overtures.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: ...Should we ever arrive at his lair. Come─we have squandered enough time already.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: Chieftain Moglin, we thank you for your gracious hospitality. Though we must soon take our leave, I pray that we may continue to nurture the shoots of this new-sprung friendship 'twixt earth and sky.

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text: Of course, of course, kupo! Visit us whenever you wish! Consider Moghome your home amongst the clouds!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Well that took rather longer than expected. We can ill afford any further delays...

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Barefaced little bastards... They have played us for fools.

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: Hraesvelgr... At last, we shall meet again.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: This journey has provided us an invaluable opportunity. We must cherish and strengthen the new bonds we have forged.

dialogue.name: KUPLOKOPP
dialogue.text: Oh, I have so many wonderful tales to tell my kinsmoogles back in the Twelveswood!

dialogue.name: MOGLIN
dialogue.text: Visit us whenever you wish, kupo! Consider Moghome your home amongst the clouds!

dialogue.name: MOGHAN
dialogue.text: Thanks for the help, kupo! I doubt I would ever have found time for all those rotten chores!

dialogue.name: MOGHAN
dialogue.text: ...H-Hey, it wasn't my idea! If the chieftain had spent a little less time sitting about and a little more time chieftaining, things would never have gotten so messy in the first place! (And he was the one who sat on the horn, by the way.)

dialogue.name: MOGHAN
dialogue.text: But now all the errands are done and the horn is fixed, so...all's well that ends well, eh, kupo?
